name: CASAMUNDO.com
tag_list: appliances, architectural-accents, architectural-coatings, artwork, barbecues, barware, bath-accessories, bedding, cabinetry, candles, cleaning-products, closet-organizers, cookware, cutlery, desktop-electronics, dinnerware, energy-conservation-products,
overview: CASAMUNDO (http://www.CASAMUNDO.com) features designer-selected architectural accents, furnishings and home decor accessories from the world’s most reputable suppliers. From appliances and cookware to designer mirrors and outdoor fountains, we’ve done the research so you can relax. It’s no accident that thousands of consumers rate most products on the CASAMUNDO site with four and five stars. Products are premium quality, heavy-duty, and worthy of lifelong enjoyment, which ensures buyer confidence in every purchase. These premium products are engineered to provide top-of-the-line performance day in and day out and stand up to everyday commercial and domestic use.
